infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: FNR needs access to your location to show nearby riders and events, and to provide weather alerts for your area.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: FNR needs access to your location to show nearby riders and events, and to provide weather alerts for your area.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FNR needs access to your camera to take photos of your bike and profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FNR needs access to your photo library to select photos of your bike and profile pictures.
